thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-BlackBerry Securing IoT Devices In New Licensing Deal With Swiss Consumer Electronics Maker Punkt

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BlackBerry Securing IoT Devices In New Licensing Deal With Swiss Consumer Electronics Maker Punkt
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - BlackBerry Ltd:
* BLACKBERRY SECURING IOT DEVICES IN NEW LICENSING DEAL WITH SWISS CONSUMER ELECTRONICS MAKER PUNKT
* BLACKBERRY LTD - SIGNED A TECHNOLOGY AND BRAND LICENSING DEAL FOR “BLACKBERRY SECURE” WITH SWISS CONSUMER ELECTRONICS MAKER, PUNKT TRONICS AG
* BLACKBERRY LTD - AGREEMENT ENABLES PUNKT TO BRING TO MARKET A RANGE OF PRODUCTS WHICH WILL EMBED BLACKBERRY CYBERSECURITY TECHNOLOGY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
